structure.unit: FORMALITY AND ASSIGNABILITY OF CONTRACTS -- INSTALLMENT SALES CONTRACTS

law.catch_line: Consideration of writing may be impeached.
law.text: The consideration of any writing, with or without seal, may be impeached or denied by pleading.
law.history: Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 49, effective July 1, 1953. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 472.
